title: Surpassing Team Sky? Jumbo-Visma and the stakes of its grand tour sweep
content:
If Vingegaard or Roglič win the Vuelta a España, Jumbo-Visma will be the first team to sweep a season's grand tours – and its reputation will be changed forever.

Read the full article at Surpassing Team Sky? Jumbo-Visma and the stakes of its grand tour sweep on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
